title: [BUG] GRContext is null on Android 5.0 when coming back from another app
body:
**Description**

I use SKGLView in a Xamarin Forms app. When I leave the app to another app and come back, the GRContext is null and so I could not draw the screen again. This happens on Android 5.0. On Android 9.0 I don't have this problem. Both tested with the emulator.

Perhaps I should call something to recreate the GRContext after coming back?
